channel.title: Authetication Time Out: Can't play the game. New Install
channel.description: :I’ve tried the game in every setting and each time I log in it says Autheticating and then Times Out After 30s: Restart or tell a dev!. I’ve tried the basic troubleshooting: validating game files, restarting computer, checking firewall, etc.
